mapper.select: select A.userinfoid, A.userid, A.usernumber, A.userimg, A.usershojian, A.userfajian, A.username, B.useraccount from userinfo A,users B where A.userid = #{userid} and A.userid = B.userid
mapper.update: update userinfo set username = #{username}, usernumber = #{usernumber}, usershojian = #{usershojian}, userfajian = #{userfajian} where userid = #{userid}
update userinfo set userimg = #{userimg} where userid = #{userid}
